-Kit-

The otter bot circled a few times on the floor, before slumping on her side, full stretch. She yawned, and peered at Pegasus with one eye. She inwardly laughed. What a weird way to sleep! He looked like he was bonking his head on the ground! 

She giggled sleepily and closed her eyes, falling asleep.

------Original Message------
From: "Joseph Frey" <jfrey1@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: May 20, 2000 9:04:50 PM GMT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


Pegasus looked around.  The cave was small but it would suit them for the
night.

Getting into a sphinx position, Pegasus laid his head down, his horn resting
on the ground.

~Am I doing the right thing, getting involved in the Beast Wars?~  He
thought to himself.  ~I don't like to fight.  But neither do the Maximals.
Oh well, can't think about that now.  I'll think about it tomorrow.

----- Original Message -----
From: Teltoli SilverFlight <teltoli@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 20, 2000 4:47 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> -Kit-
>
> Also looks at the sun, and grins. "Guess we should" Without she puts her
scanners on and searches for something like a cave, or a hollow tree.
>
> But then again she didn't think a unicorn would be able to fit in a hollow
tree like her. A cave it was then.
>
> "Here!!! Found a cave!!" She yells to Pegasus half a minute later. It was
fairly big, but with a smaller entrance so it wasn't as exposed to the
outside. It was nice and warm inside.. insulated. Kit thanks her good luck.
"Whoo!"
